meanings.def: a political leader who has complete power over a country, especially one who has gained it using military force
examples: The country suffered at the hands of a series of military dictators.
The country has long been ruled by a right-wing dictator.
He was seen by many as a benevolent dictator.

meanings.def: a person who behaves as if they have complete power over other people, and tells them what to do
examples: Her father was a dictator and the whole family was afraid of him.
